credit_line: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
title: Mixmaster
description: One-piece, metal and plastic mixer stand (part a) composed of cylindrical, metal motor unit with plastic handle at top and settings dial on rear, atop a curved metal arm on a tear-drop shaped plastic base; circular plastic turntable (part b) inset in base, to support one of two interchangeable bowls: small circular clear glass bowl (part c); large circular clear glass bowl (part d).  Motor unit tilts back, allowing removal of bowl, and access to two detachable metal beaters (parts e,f) depending from unit.  Additional interchangeable components are: white ceramic reamer on metal shaft (part g); clear glass juicer (part h) in form of shallow, circular bowl with tube-like protrusion.
name: Mixer
